DOC.brief_title: Varenicline Nicotine Patch Promoting Smoking Cessation Among Current Smokers
DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . To determine mail delivery 12 week varenicline result improve smoking cessation outcomes relative nicotine replacement therapy ( NRT ) 300 smoker . II . To determine delivery varenicline cost-effective compare nicotine patch . OUTLINE : Patients randomize 1 2 treatment arm . ARM I : Patients undergo general smoke cessation counsel receive varenicline orally ( PO ) twice daily ( QD ) day 1-28 . Courses repeat every 28 day 12 week . ARM II : Patients undergo general smoke cessation counsel receive nicotine patch continuously 12 week . After completion study treatment , patient follow 4 month .
